text.__SUMMARY__: Miralda scopulorum is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell grows to a length of 2 mm.
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the Pacific Ocean off the Philippines and Hawaii.
